messages.message: I'm seeing a similar issue in aihub-uat for the Doc Translation app. It's not able to load the pdf file because of CSP
oh, is this because we are directly reading this data from S3 instead of having this come through instabase.com (http://instabase.com) domain?  This is something we should fix though, right?

It's loading it from the instabse file system api.
```https://aihub-sandbox.internal.instabase.com/aayush.dutt/my-repo/fs/Instabase%20Drive/app-runs/71cb6ac8-d488-43b3-95f4-f37680a66636/1700647012334/output/translation/german.pdf.pdf```
I can see the file exists in the drive, and is loadable in the file preview pdf viewer

This is what I see.  I am not sure why there is a player.vimeo reference in here.

That link points to the fact that we are directly loading the file from S3.
Adding @Ashwin to take a look at this tomorrow

I think there's a redirect that takes it to the s3 location for pdf
```https://aihub-sandbox.internal.instabase.com/aayush.dutt/my-repo/fs/Instabase%20Drive/app-runs/71cb6ac8-d488-43b3-95f4-f37680a66636/1700647012334/output/translation/german.pdf.pdf```
